titleStmt.title: The humble petition of divers well-affected persons, delivered the 6th day of July, 1659. To the supreme authority, the Parliament of the Common-vvealth of England. With the Parliaments answer thereunto, and sense thereupon.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Brewster, at the three Bibles in Pauls Church-yard, at the West end,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Bibles in Pauls Church-yard, at the West end
